attributes.comment:
I am writing on behalf of my husband and myself. We are in the waiting stages of
the long adoption process. We feel that adoption is a heartfelt choice in giving a
home to a child who needs a mother and father.

The process itself is long and consuming. Emotions are at its highs and its lows.
The process itself in terms of monetary amounts is already high. To increase the
proposed fees would make it a hardship on many families. This might have an
impact on their decision on whether to adopt once or even again. Please do not
put this kind of strain on families who have the love to give to a child who so
desperately needs a home. My husband and I feel strongly against the proposed
plans to increase the stated fees.

Thank you for your time and consideration on this very important matter.

Karen

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Karen Siu
